collection:
###

User Identification and Data Storage:

Upon user sign-up for our GPT, a unique user ID is generated.

###

Sign-up and Payment Processing:

Sign-up and subscription payments are handled by Kobble.io, where users may
provide personal information such as name, email address, and Google or
Microsoft account details.

Using Kobble.io, we do have access to this
personally identifiable information (PII) for account management, customer
support, and service optimization purposes.

###

User Rights & Data Transparency

Users have the right to inquire about the data we collect and request access,
correction, or deletion of their personal information.

###

Age Restrictions

Our services are accessible to a wide audience, but we do not knowingly
collect or solicit personal information from individuals under 13 years of
age.

If you believe we have inadvertently collected such information, please
contact us so we can promptly address the issue.
sharing:
###

Third-Party Data Sharing

While we may access personal data through Kobble.io, we do not share this
information with third parties without your consent, except as necessary to
provide our services or as required by law.
